p: On the other hand, as a complement to the investigations of Lotina-Hennsen et al. [ 101] on biologically active limonoids with potential herbicidal properties, Céspedes et al. [ 60] carried out assays to evaluate phytotoxic properties of compound 164 from the heartwood of C. salvadorensis against the same species of monocot and dicot seeds presented in Céspedes et al. [ 66].
